Sentencas: Cermets composed of submicron size alternating lamellae of CeO2, or 10% Gadolinia doped Ceria (GDC), and porous-metallic Cobalt have been prepared from eutectic oxide mixtures.
Titulo: Textured cermets of CeO2 (or GDC) with Co for solid oxide fuel cells anodes

Sentencas: A fine eutectic structure was obtained by fast directional solidification of the cobalt oxide ceria oxide eutectic composite using the Laser Floating Zone (LFZ) technique.
Titulo: Textured cermets of CeO2 (or GDC) with Co for solid oxide fuel cells anodes

Sentencas: The resulting microstructure, with an interphase spacing down to 0.5 mu m, was obtained for solidification rates of 750 mm/h. Textured cermets were obtained by subsequent reduction under H-2 containing atmosphere of the eutectic oxide composite.
Titulo: Textured cermets of CeO2 (or GDC) with Co for solid oxide fuel cells anodes

Sentencas: The reduction kinetics was studied in the 550-750 degrees C temperature range and effective diffusion coefficients were obtained.
Titulo: Textured cermets of CeO2 (or GDC) with Co for solid oxide fuel cells anodes

Sentencas: The reduction process does not correspond to a typical thermally activated process.
Titulo: Textured cermets of CeO2 (or GDC) with Co for solid oxide fuel cells anodes

Sentencas: The cermets are composed of ceria lamellae of about 200 nm thickness alternated with porous-metallic cobalt lamellae of <= 400 nm.
Titulo: Textured cermets of CeO2 (or GDC) with Co for solid oxide fuel cells anodes

Sentencas: The lamellar microstructure of the cermets favours oxygen ion mobility through ceria and its size can be controlled by solidification rate of the eutectic precursor.
Titulo: Textured cermets of CeO2 (or GDC) with Co for solid oxide fuel cells anodes

Sentencas: These materials are proposed as SOFC anodes.
Titulo: Textured cermets of CeO2 (or GDC) with Co for solid oxide fuel cells anodes
